name: Dorian Gloinec
title: Data Engineer
tagline: Hi there! Welcome to my website. I am a data engineer with a background in quantitative finance and accounting, passionate about building scalable and reliable systems. Currently, I work at Epidemic Sound as a Financial Systems Engineer. On this site, you can explore my professional experience and education. In my spare time, I enjoy working out and outdoor camping. Feel free to reach out to me if you have any questions or just want to chat!
